name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy & Paste as Text - Neatly formatted

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy and paste any content in a clean, well-structured plain text format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of messy text after copying from Word, Excel, or web pages? "Copy & Paste as Text" is here to help! 

Easily convert formatted text, tables, lists, and other formatted content into neat, structured plain text with just a few clicks.

‚ú® Simply copy-paste from Excel, Word, or web pages!
Our extension does the rest, transforming it into clean text.

üî† Preserve Structure of your data. 
Rows and columns are converted into well-organized plain text.

‚úÇÔ∏è Simplify Complex Formats 
Whether it's a multi-column table or a bulleted list, 
"Table to Text" breaks down complex formats into readable text.

‚å®Ô∏è Keyboard Shortcuts
Use standard copy (Ctrl+C) and paste (Ctrl+V) shortcuts for easy and efficient operation.

üöÄ Fast and Intuitive 
No learning curve! Just copy, paste, and get the text you need.

üåê Works Anywhere. Clean, text-only output.
Copying from emails, spreadsheets, or web content ...

Say goodbye to messy text conversions and hello to clarity with "Copy & Paste as Text".

Start transforming your tables and formatted text into clean plain text today!
